summary: This document is an AT&T Wireless billing statement for the account of Jeffrey E. Epstein & Co., covering the period from September 13, 2003, to October 12, 2003. It details multiple phone lines, service charges, and extensive call logs showing numerous calls to and from locations including New York, Washington D.C., Florida, the United Kingdom, and the U.S. Virgin Islands.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: The primary account holder for the AT&T Wireless service, with billing address at 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY.

events.title: Wireless Billing Cycle
events.description: Monthly billing period for Jeffrey E. Epstein's AT&T Wireless account, showing detailed call activity, roaming, and messaging.

events.title: Payment Received
events.description: A payment of $1,526.46 was received for the wireless account.

locations: U.S. Virgin Islands (St. Croix, Charlotte Amalie)
keyFacts: The billing statement shows Jeffrey Epstein's company maintained multiple wireless lines with AT&T in October 2003, with a total amount due of $1,163.10.
Detailed call logs reveal extensive communication patterns between New York, Washington D.C./Maryland/Virginia area, Florida, and international locations like the UK and US Virgin Islands.
Roaming charges indicate international travel to Great Britain and the U.S. Virgin Islands during the billing period.
The account shows a high volume of calls, including many incoming calls and calls to mobile numbers, suggesting active communication networks.
The billing address for the account is 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY, which is a known Epstein property.
